title: Nocturnal Wildlife Walk
description: Join our expert guides for an evening walk to spot badgers, foxes, and owls in their natural habitat.

title: Family Nature Trail
description: A fun-filled nature trail suitable for all ages. Learn to identify animal tracks and spot wildlife together!

title: Junior Rangers Club
description: Become a Junior Ranger! Activities include pond dipping, bug hunting, and making wildlife crafts. Ages 5-12.

title: Photography Masterclass
description: Learn wildlife photography techniques from professionals. Capture stunning images of British wildlife.

title: Mini Beast Safari
description: Explore the world of insects and creepy crawlies! Perfect for young nature lovers. Ages 4-8.

title: Seal Watching Boat Trip
description: Take a boat trip to see common and grey seals in their natural coastal habitat. All ages welcome.

title: Owl Pellet Investigation
description: Dissect owl pellets to discover what owls eat! A hands-on science activity. Ages 7-12.

title: Dawn Chorus Walk
description: Experience the magical spring dawn chorus with an expert birder. Learn to identify bird songs.

title: Hedgehog Hospital Tour
description: Visit our hedgehog rescue centre and learn how we care for these prickly patients. Meet recovering hedgehogs!

title: Build a Bird Box
description: Make your own bird box to take home! Help garden birds find homes. Ages 6-12 (adult supervision required).

title: Conservation Volunteer Day
description: Help maintain wildlife habitats! Tasks include hedge laying, pond clearing, and habitat creation.

title: Pond Dipping Adventure
description: Discover the amazing creatures living in our pond! Newts, dragonfly larvae, and more. Ages 5-10.
